mapper.select: SELECT a.*, sd.value as status_value, b.title as goods_name, m.nickname as merchant_name, u.nickname as user_name FROM shop_goods_order a LEFT JOIN shop_goods b ON (a.goods_id = b.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_info m ON (b.user_id=m.userId) LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON (a.user_id=u.userId) left join `sys_dict` sd on(a.status=sd.code and sd.type='goods_order_status') WHERE a.order_code=#{id}
